overview: After the incident when ADAM hit a girl named Melati with his car, Adam and his family decided to take care of her. Melati wakes up the day after but she cannot remember a thing except her name.  Seri feels threatened by Melatiâ€™s presence because Seri been dreaming to make Adam her husband.
tagline: You're Not Mine Forever [Kau bukan milikku selamanya]
title: Paku Pontianak
